content: Hello, I wanted to follow up on issues with the FamilyMemeberHistory-genetics tracker item in https://gforge.hl7.org/gf/project/fhir/tracker/?action=TrackerItemEdit&tracker_id=677&tracker_item_id=19239 because it still is an issue in R4 . Has anyone had a chance to take a look at that?
thanks for pointing out the issue. The profiling spreadsheet contained some unnecessary content which i removed. PR: https://github.com/HL7/fhir/pull/575
Thanks Patrick. Is it possible to see the json that would be generated by this change?

currently waiting for response of other CG commiters/ co-chairs if they agree with pre-applying this before voting on it.
The old version was definitely kind of broken.
cool, that looks like it fixes my concerns! Thanks a lot Patrick!
what would "pre-applying" for it do? presumably the fix would require a new version of all of fhir to be published (e.g., 4.0.1)
there's a technical correction planned to be published in late august

what would "pre-applying" for it do?

be able to merge it into the FHIR CI build before the tracker was voted on. So you could start using it earlier.
I think we could vote on this next tuesday call. It's a technical correction, nothing complicated.
